Address: 40 NAMAL TEL AVIV ST., TEL AVIV, 6701101, Israel
CompanyDescription:
Wix was founded in late 2006 on the belief that the Internet should be
accessible to everyone to develop, create and contribute. In April 2008, we
launched our Wix Editor, which enabled the creation of a digital presence in
Flash format, and in October 2008, we launched our premium subscription
offering. By April 2012, a month after we released our advanced HTML5 Editor,
which greatly improved our service offering and support for mobile devices, we
had reached 20 million registered users. In October 2013, we launched a further
enhanced mobile product. In October 2015, we launched our new redesigned Wix
Editor, which is based on a complete restructuring of the platform's codebase,
developed using Facebook's React Technology. This newly designed editor offers a
significantly leaner codebase, better modularization and improved testability.
In 2016, we launched Wix Artificial Design Intelligence, or Wix ADI.
